### COMPLETE VEHICLE INVENTORY FOR AI TRAINING

#### DENAGO ELECTRIC VEHICLES
1. DENAGO EV City
   - Price: $11,995
   - Type: Urban mobility solution
   - Features: Street-legal capabilities, modern design
   - Use Case: City transportation, urban communities
   - Specifications: Electric drive, compact design

2. DENAGO EV Nomad
   - Type: Adventure-ready electric golf cart
   - Features: All-terrain capability, rugged design
   - Use Case: Off-road recreation, versatile transportation

3. DENAGO EV Nomad XL
   - Type: Extended adventure golf cart
   - Features: Enhanced capacity, extended range
   - Use Case: Large group transportation, extended trips

4. DENAGO EV Rover XL
   - Type: Premium extended range golf cart
   - Features: Luxury amenities, enhanced comfort
   - Use Case: Premium transportation, golf courses

5. DENAGO EV Rover XL6
   - Type: 6-passenger premium golf cart
   - Features: Maximum passenger capacity, premium features
   - Use Case: Group transportation, commercial use

6. DENAGO EV Rover XXL
   - Type: Maximum capacity extended range golf cart
   - Features: Largest capacity, extended range capability
   - Use Case: Commercial applications, large group transport

##### Carrier Series
1. Evolution Carrier 6 Plus
   - Type: 6-passenger utility golf cart
   - Features: Cargo capacity, utility design
   - Use Case: Commercial transport, utility applications

2. Evolution Carrier 8 Plus
   - Type: 8-passenger utility golf cart
   - Features: Maximum cargo capacity, commercial grade
   - Use Case: Large group transport, commercial operations

   - Type: 2-passenger classic design golf cart

   - Use Case: Professional use, premium applications
